list.question: How do I use this template?
How do I change the language?
How do I change the theme?

list.title: We use our product
list.content: All our products are built with Blue Panda Bases.

list.title: Made by experts
list.content: Ex google engineers and +15 years of experience.

list.title: We support you
list.content: We have a dedicated support team to help you on Slack.

list.title: Easy to translate
list.content: Support for your languages, sell easily in multiple countries. You modify from 1 file only.

list.title: Easy to customize
list.content: Components, sections, pages, and more are readable and simple. You can customize everything.

list.title: Up to date
list.content: Built with the latest version of React, Next.js, and Libs. You can use the latest features safely.

list.title: SEO & Performance
list.content: All lighthouse scores are 100%. You can use this template for your SEO and performance from day one.

list.title: Save time
list.content: We use this template too for our websites, so we know how to save your time. You can use it for your business.

list.title: Extendable
list.content: This is a base for your project, you can extend it as you want. You can add new pages, components, and more.
